introduction_description: Choose your preferred theme and language to get started with a comfortable, tailored experience that suits your style.
onboarding_body_1: Dive into a world of events crafted to fit your unique interests. Whether you're into live music, art workshops, professional networking, or simply discovering new experiences, we have something for everyone. Our curated recommendations will help you explore, connect, and make the most of every opportunity around you.
onboarding_body_2: Take the hassle out of organizing events with our all-in-one planning tools. From setting up invites and managing RSVPs to scheduling reminders and coordinating details, we’ve got you covered. Plan with ease and focus on what matters – creating an unforgettable experience for you and your guests.
onboarding_body_3: Make every event memorable by sharing the experience with others. Our platform lets you invite friends, keep everyone in the loop, and celebrate moments together. Capture and share the excitement with your network, so you can relive the highlights and cherish the memories.
passwordNotValid: Password must be at least 6 characters long
internal_server_error: some thing went wrong, try again later
not_found_error: url not found, try again later
connection_timeout_error: Time out error, Try again later
cancel_error: Request was cancelled, Try again later
recieve_timeout_error: Recieve time out error, Try again later
send_timeout_error: Send time out error, Try again later
unknown_error: some thing went wrong, try again later
default_error: some thing went wrong, try again later
google: Google sign-in was canceled or failed
facebook: Facebook sign-in was canceled or failed
week_password: The password provided is too weak.
email_exists: The account already exists for that email.
user_not_found: No user found for that email.
wrong_password: Wrong password provided for that user.
too_many_requests: Too many requests, please try again later.
opration_not_allowed: Operation not allowed, please try again later.
different_credential: This account exists with different credential.
invalid_continue_uri: The continue URL provided in the request is invalid.
unauthorized_continue_uri: The domain of the continue URL is not whitelisted. Whitelist the domain in the Firebase console.
no_worries: No worries, we will send you reset instructions.
